About Our Presentations

All presentations are built with RevealJS and Quarto, featuring:

  • Interactive navigation with keyboard and mouse controls
  • Speaker notes and presentation mode
  • Mobile-responsive design for any device
  • Print-friendly PDF export capabilities
  • Live code execution where applicable
